name: I WANNA GO HOME (hujy)
description:
This is what we made at the Global Game Jam 2019, a pixel style platformer! The theme of that GGJ was 'home'. We were struggling to  come up with a brilliant idea about home. One of us was like: I feel so tired, let's just make something and go home.  So that's it, a going home game!

Drag with your mouse to adjust the direction and power of your jetpack. You may have to wait for the jetpack recharging after several continuous jet.  Also, remember to always follow the blue arrow and look for the hint sign! Have FUN!
